title: hari smaraNaiyuDan
sahitya:
hari smaraNaiyuDan sEvai sheivOm Arulagil aruLAKSi OngavE


anupallavi

  nara mAniDar vAzhvu pera jnAna bhakti karmamAna sAdhanattAl


caraNam    ahankAra mamakAra ghOraminri Atma nEsamum arppaNamum koNDE
bhagavAnukku enrum palanai aLittE paNivuDan vIrat-tuNivuDan kUDiyE
